events.title: Woking College
events.description: Began my studies at Woking College, studying Statistics, Computer Science, and Engineering BTEC.

events.title: University of Portsmouth
events.description: Started my degree, BSc Software Engineering. I also joined the Archery and Rowing societies

events.title: CMP Awards
events.description: My team was shortlisted and nominated for a CMP award for our work with the DIO (Defence Infrastructure Organisation). It was an incredible experience to be recognised for our hard work and dedication to the project.

events.title: Sainsburys
events.description: Started working at my local Sainsburys as a temporary job whilst I worked on my own projects and figure out what was next.
